title: Welcome Back!
description:
Welcome to our new blog, James Hardaway. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
contents: Thanks for stopping by my little corner of the web. This portfolio site is being built as part of a class requirement for the masters program I am just now beginning at NC State. Over the next 2 years or so, I will use this landing spot to drop insights and artifacts from my journey through Learning Design & Technology studies at the NCSU College of Education. Wish me luck!!
